meanings.definition: A drug used as a decongestant to relieve nasal congestion.
meanings.sent1: I took phenylephrine to help clear my stuffy nose.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed phenylephrine to treat my nasal congestion.
meanings.sent3: After taking phenylephrine, I felt like my nose was on vacation.
meanings.sent4: The phenylephrine worked like a traffic cop, directing the congestion away.
meanings.sent5: With phenylephrine, my nose felt as open as a highway on a sunny day.

meanings.definition: A medication that constricts blood vessels to increase blood pressure.
meanings.sent1: The phenylephrine helped raise my blood pressure when I needed it.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use phenylephrine to boost blood pressure in patients.
meanings.sent3: I joked that phenylephrine turned my veins into tiny tunnels for cars.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like phenylephrine, pushing her blood pressure higher.
meanings.sent5: The effect of phenylephrine on blood vessels was like a strong hand squeezing tightly.

meanings.definition: A compound that acts as a sympathomimetic amine.
meanings.sent1: Phenylephrine is a sympathomimetic amine that can have various effects.
meanings.sent2: Athletes sometimes use phenylephrine for its sympathomimetic properties.
meanings.sent3: The party was lively, like a room full of phenylephrine molecules.
meanings.sent4: In the body, phenylephrine mimics the actions of natural stimulants.
meanings.sent5: The way phenylephrine mimics natural substances is fascinating to scientists.
